description:
The Lifepro Curriculum allows the Lifestyle-Student to tap into his/her Created and Creative Potential by helping him/her to uncover his/her Divine Design and to start expressing and extending the Core of his/her Being and Becoming in a Creative Way.

The relaxed Instructional Pace allows the Creative Process to evolve gradually within each Life Dimension, thereby offering the Student the Opportunity to make those lasting Connections needed to Authenticate from deep within.

</p>
title: Stepping Up on the Social Front: Lifepro (Part 1a)
